actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow health insurance premiums to be fully deductible to the extent not in excess of $3,000.
short_title: Health Insurance Premium Deductibility Act of 1995

summary.text: Health Insurance Premium Deductibility Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for health insurance premiums up to $3,000.

titles.title: Health Insurance Premium Deductibility Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow health insurance premiums to be fully deductible to the extent not in excess of $3,000.
